squidpony.squidgrid

Class TextBlockFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.TextBlockFactory

  • public class TextBlockFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class for creating text blocks. Stores images in a TreeMap to prevent duplicate object creation where not needed. For applications with many repeated text blocks, this is an ideal way to hold and create them.

        public void initializeBySize(int width,
                    int height,
                    java.awt.Font font,
                    boolean whiteSpace)
        Sets up the factory to provide images based on the cell width and height passed in. The font size will be used as a starting point, and reduced as needed to fit within the cell.

      • willFit

        public boolean willFit(char c,
              boolean whiteSpace)
        Returns true if the given character will fit inside the current cell dimensions with the current font. ISO Control characters are considered to not fit by definition.
        Parameters:
        c -
        whiteSpace - if true then there must be room for the character c and at least one empty pixel on all sides of the character
        Returns:
